entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Greater Napanee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:20 a.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 13.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming west 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. A few showers beginning near noon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
